long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Small extension for LinkedIn, providing "Connect All" button which let user add all people from current search list to the contact network. It is minor update but highly improving UX, especially if you are recruiter who need to expand network shortly.
